column5: Hi guys and girls,  Kevin posted this deal a while back but when I had the chance to take a look they didn't have it anymore. Apparently it's back ... here's the link  Pleasure Craft Operators Card  You pay for it first and you'll get a PIN number ... with that PIN you can take the test whenever you want. I just ordered my PIN. 2009 is coming real soon and for those who haven't gotten one yet it's a pretty good deal.  No i don't work for that site lol. I hope that this would not be considered as   ... just a heads up for all the members.  Victor
Thanks Victor, my daughter need to get hers so apprectiate the link.
awesome, my brother still needs his. thanks for the link!
